strapiPost.title: The Hogeye Marathon Is Just A Month Away
strapiPost.content:
The 47th Annual Hogey Marathon is next month, with the marathon, half marathon, & 4-person relay scheduled for Apr 15, followed by the Sunday Fun Day 5k & 10k on Apr 16.

  • Hogeye history: Founded in 1977, the Hogeye Marathon has attracted runners to Springdale for over four decades, providing an exciting spring race opportunity and raising support for local nonprofits.
  • Good running: Proceeds raised by The Hogeye Marathon & Relays benefit local charities like the American Wheelchair Mission, Jackson Graves Foundation, Kendrick Fincher Hydration for Life, and Meals on Wheels of Washington County.

Register for the race or to volunteer HERE.
